name: Viking Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner Norse warrior! Generate epic Viking names fit for a saga. Perfect for games, stories, or just embracing your inner shieldmaiden or berserker.
introduction: Ready to raid and pillage... uh, I mean *create* some awesome Viking names? Look no further! Our Viking Name Generator will forge names worthy of Odin himself. Whether you're role-playing, writing a fantasy novel, or just curious about your Viking alter ego, we've got you covered. Prepare for glory!
howToUse: Feast your eyes on the glorious Viking name that appears!
Don't like it? Click again! We've got more names than Valhalla has mead.
Copy and paste your chosen name and unleash it upon the world!
Share your epic Viking name with your friends and prepare for them to be *in awe*.

faqs.question: Is this generator *actually* Viking?
faqs.answer: Well, it's not like we're summoning the spirits of ancient Norsemen. But we've studied Viking naming conventions and lore to bring you names that *sound* authentically Viking. So, pretty darn close!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my D&D character?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! In fact, we encourage it. Go forth and conquer your campaign with a name that strikes fear into the hearts of your enemies (and impresses your DM).

faqs.question: Are the generated names male, female, or gender-neutral?
faqs.answer: We aim for a mix! Some names lean towards masculine or feminine, but many are suitable for any Viking warrior, regardless of gender. Let your axe do the talking!

faqs.question: How many names can I generate?
faqs.answer: As many as your heart desires! We have a virtually endless supply. Keep clicking until you find the *perfect* name that resonates with your Viking soul.

faqs.question: Can I suggest names to add to the generator?
faqs.answer: We're always looking to expand our Viking name repertoire! Feel free to send us your suggestions. If they're suitably epic, we might just include them!

faqs.question: Will using a generated name automatically make me good at axe throwing?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. But it *will* make you *feel* like you should be good at axe throwing. We recommend practicing responsibly (and away from small children and pets).
